00023 #ifndef NODE_H
00024 #define NODE_H
00025 
00026 #include "system.h"
00027 #include <inttypes.h>
00028 #include <netdb.h>
00029 #include "memory.h"
00030 #include "pthread-wrapper.h"
00031 #include "hashtab.h"
00032 
00034 typedef struct node_def
00035 {
00036 #ifdef ENABLE_CHECKING
00037   long unused0;
00038   long unused1;
00039 #endif
00040 
00041   pthread_mutex_t mutex;
00042   uint32_t id;                  
00043   string name;                  
00044   string host_name;             
00045   time_t last_connect;          
00046   int fd;                       
00047   unsigned int generation;      
00048   bool marked;                  
00050   /* Tables for mapping between ZFS IDs and node IDs.  */
00051   htab_t map_uid_to_node;
00052   htab_t map_uid_to_zfs;
00053   htab_t map_gid_to_node;
00054   htab_t map_gid_to_zfs;
00055 } *node;
00056 
00058 #define NODE_NONE 0             /* ID for non-existing node, used as SID
00059                                    in file handle of virtual directory.  */
00060

00071 extern node this_node;

00074 #define HASH_NODE_NAME(NAME) crc32_buffer ((NAME).str, (NAME).len)
00075 
00077 #define NODE_HASH_NAME(NODE) HASH_NODE_NAME ((NODE)->name)
